programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Tamir, Charlie, Julia, and Cookie Monster are making self-portraits in the community garden with Kayla. Kayla guides them to look into the mirror and notice the beautiful things that make you, you! Everyone looks at themselves in the mirror and starts drawing what they see. They also learn their identity is about what you love to do. So, they add onto their self-portraits and then share their drawings with each other. Cookie Monster draws his blue fur, his googly eyes, and cookies. Charlie draws her blue eyes, curly blonde hair, tap shoes, and challah bread because it’s one of her favorite Jewish foods. Julia draws her straight hair, musical notes, paw prints, and her dog Rose. Elmo draws his red fur, orange nose, a piano, and watering a flower with Abby because being a kind neighbor is part of Elmo’s identity. Tamir draws his brown skin, coily hair, comic books, and some veggies as he loves gardening in the community garden. There are so many special things that make you, you!

programme.desc: In early 11th century China, the Song Dynasty is being invaded by armies of the rival state Western Xia. Yang, the last of a long line of Song generals, is killed and his widowed wife Mu leads other widows into battle to save their dynasty.

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: A lawyer and zookeepers disguised themselves as animals in order to save a zoo from getting shut down.

programme.title: Isabelle
programme.desc: A young couple's dream of starting a family shatters as they descend into the depths of paranoia and must struggle to survive an evil presence that wants nothing more than their very own lives.

programme.title: Mukoku
programme.desc: Kengo was also accomplished in kendo, but he stopped participating in the martial art activity after an incident. Now, he spends his days drinking and working as a security guard at a station building. Based on novel "Mukoku" by Shu Fujisawa.

programme.title: Prison On Fire
programme.desc: Inside a Chinese prison two inmates form a friendship and face the difficulty of life on the inside.

programme.title: Broken City
programme.desc: In a city rife with injustice, an ex-cop seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed and then framed by its most powerful figure

programme.title: The Fearless Hyena
programme.desc: A young man whose sickly grandfather has taught him a secret form of Kung Fu, starts to make a living off of his unique fighting style only to attract the attention of his grandfather's mortal enemy.

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: An American sharpshooter engages in a deadly game of cat and mouse with an Iraqi sniper, who has him pinned behind a small chunk of concrete.

programme.title: Tiger Cage 2
programme.desc: Gangsters pursue a Hong Kong lawman framed for murder and a lawyer they believe is linked to laundered money.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, A girl will risk everything to protect the people she cares most about.

programme.desc: A true hidden gem of South Africa, the Garden Route is a 200km stretch of coastal highway known for its beguiling diversity and unparalleled spirit of wilderness.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: After the Vietnam War ended in 1975, many Vietnamese people settled down in San Francisco. In this episode we meet several Vietnamese immigrants, learn about their journey to America and tastes their amazing authentic Vietnamese food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: No other cuisine has had such an impact on modern dishes then Italians. Italians arrived here in droves and got straight to work. They are now loved by all, but it wasn’t always that way.

programme.title: United Plates Of America

programme.title: United Plates Of America

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: It takes patience and commitment for The Rhino Orphanage, as they nurture young rhinos whose mothers have been lost to poaching.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The two oldest rhinos are set to be released back into the wild. Three rhinos cause a stir as they go missing, while the younger rhinos make steady progress toward health and happiness.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer has arrived in Alaska.This sets the scene for one of the world's greatest migrations of the Alaskan salmon run.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: With Snotlout’s fate unclear, Gustav tries to fill in for him at the Dragon Academy.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless, and the dragon riders discover an injured Scauldron on the shores of Changewing Island. When the Scauldron takes a shine to Ruffnut, the kids see a chance to heal the dragon and return him safely to the ocean, before he falls victim to the elements, as well as the territorial Changewings.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: During an ice storm, Speed Stingers infest Berk, driving the residents into hiding.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods

Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist – but it's no good! She still can't master it! programme.title: CSI S4 E08 - After The Show
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: CSI S4 E09 - Grissom Versus the Volcano
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: Frasier S5 E20 - First Date

programme.title: CSI S4 E09 - Grissom Versus the Volcano
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E24 - Goodbye Eddie Cain
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: V: The Final Battle E05 - Part V
programme.desc: The resistance group struggle to find weaknesses of the aliens they can exploit. In addition, not all the aliens feel their invasion was right, and they too work to stop the war.

programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: Silang Matatapang (Walang Atras Sa Laban)
programme.desc: Raymond Bagatsing is set to plunge headstrong into this action picture. His voluptuous real life girlfriend, Shirley Fuentes, is part of the cast in this slambang action movie.

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Palabra De Honor (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia headed this all-star cast in a searing drama about a millionaire patriarch and the power he wielded among the people in an entire town.

programme.title: Abrakadabra
programme.desc: Dolphy is a poor man who finds a jar which turns out to be the home of a genie (Jimmy Santos).

programme.title: Misis Mo, Misis Ko
programme.desc: Two married couples, Dina and Edu and Jackie and Ricky, became close friends. The amorous merry-go-round came full circle when hurt at what she and he thought was betrayal.

programme.title: Sa Isang Sulok Ng Mga Pangarap
programme.desc: Alice Dixson turned in two powerful performances as the young woman forced into plastic surgery and as the wife she was made to resemble who got hold of her husband's (Ariel Rivera) money and then ran off with her lover.

programme.title: Macho Dancer
programme.desc: Pol came to the big city in search of a better life, but instead, he encountered the harsh reality, which would take more than dreams to survive.

programme.title: Vizconde Massacre 2
programme.desc: Carlo J. Caparas, master of the massacre film took another look at the Vizconde rape and murder case with this film.

programme.title: The Lilian Velez Story, Till Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: She was a famous young soprano turned movie actress, while he was a former child actor trying to make it as a leading man. They made a good pair on the screen. He loved her and saw their team-up as salvation of his waning career. Unable to accept the truth, he stabbed her to death one evening.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Boy Buluran: Head Hunter Ng Maynila
programme.desc: Ronnie Ricketts, played the title role in the true story of Sgt. Boy Buluran, whose clever way with disguises and massive information network brought down a syndicate of bank robbers.

programme.title: Wala Na Bang Pag-ibig?
programme.desc: For years, they have been the best of friends. Gemma is bratty Eric’s buddy, and to some extent, accomplice in his not too few escapades. But what if one day, all of a sudden, Gemma feels something different for Eric?

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Built on three hills and surrounded by a wall, Siena in central Italy, is a world-famous beautiful city. Its Historic Center dates to the late 13th century and is registered as a World Heritage Site.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: For over 100 years, Hirosaki Park in Aomori Prefecture has been a beloved spot to see sakura blossoms. See the multifaceted beauty of sakura blossoms through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: National Parks of Japan:Kerama
programme.desc: Keramashoto National Park offers pristine waters that support a diverse ecosystem. It's also home to people who proactively carry out conservation activities and proudly carry on a distinct culture.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: In Ibaraki, we explore how local wisdom has been passed down to the present day. We visit a town famous for organic farming, see how traditional silk fabric is made, and experience catching icefish.

programme.title: Design Ah neo: "Assemble" Special
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An "Assemble" special episode.

programme.title: Mitateru-phose #4
programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: BRIDEAR (a five-piece all-female heavy metal band with a growing fanbase in Europe) and Matsuura Kodai (a singer with an astonishingly versatile voice).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-9.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Frozen food products widely available in Japan include hundreds of pasta dishes and even sushi. New flash-freezing techniques are improving quality, reducing food waste, and driving innovation.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Kitties work year-round to keep tiger pufferfish from being snatched up by hungry herons! Myojin Pond is a famous place to see kitties. We dare you not to laugh at the kitty napping inside the shrine!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: EKIBEN JAPAN
programme.desc: In April, as cherry blossoms bloom in Aomori, the Sakura Bento goes on sale along the Tsugaru Railway, filled with spring flavors like local scallops, tender kombu, and miso with a wild spring plant.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The perfect shading in beautiful tie-dyed patterns may result from sections randomly touching in the dye. Discover the future of clamp resist dyeing.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Gardener Yamashita Rikito collects plants with nowhere to go, that must be removed for demolition or renovation, and finds them new homes; saving them while saving those who give them up from regret.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: 58 Stolen Years
programme.desc: Hakamada Iwao spent nearly fifty years on death row, in constant fear of execution. His sister Hideko devoted her life to proving his innocence. We follow their long battle for freedom.

programme.title: Friends S5 15
programme.desc: Chandler thinks Monica wants more from their relationship. Ross fails to impress his new neighbors.

programme.title: Friends S5 16
programme.desc: After Phoebe finds a police badge, she uses it to do good deeds. Joey worries that he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends S5 17
programme.desc: Rachel interviews for a great job but she may get it for the wrong reason. Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebe's.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 8
programme.desc: Hot items from New Orleans spice up the bidding, but will the cans bring in the green? Or will a voodoo curse make its mark? Plus, a refrigerated unit sends chills down bidders' spines when they discover its intended recipient is incarcerated.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 9
programme.desc: A new team shakes up the competition and tests Mo's reign as 'the furniture king', while Matthew goes hard after a three-wheel adventure. Plus, an avalanche of ping pong balls causes chaos in the yard.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 10
programme.desc: Four unique containers go up for auction after missing their holiday deadlines. A can of vintage nostalgia has Matt salivating, "Team Muscle turns into "Team Softy," and Uzi gets the scare of a lifetime. Plus, a mysterious logo could be the key tobig bucks

programme.title: Container Wars S3 11
programme.desc: When jumbo-sized containers make their way to the yard, buyers use every trick in the book to win, big time. A bin full of outdoor BBQs could send two bidders up in flames, while a 'ready-to-go' rave unit sounds like music to the Israeli's ears. Plus, Mo and Ty feel the need for speed, but will their huge bet pay off?

programme.title: Clash Of The Titans
programme.desc: In CLASH OF THE TITANS, the ultimate struggle for power pits men against kings and kings against gods. But the war between the gods themselves could destroy the world. Sam Worthington (Terminator Salvation, Avatar) stars as the Greek hero Perseus in this spectacular retelling of the classic myth (and '80s cult classic film). Born of a god, but raised as a man, Perseus is helpless to save his family from the clutches of Hades (Oscar nominee Ralph Fiennes -- Harry Potter films), the vengeful god of the underworld. With nothing left to lose, he volunteers to lead a dangerous mission to defeat Hades before he can seize power from Zeus (Oscar nominee Liam Neeson -- Batman Begins) and unleash hell on earth. With a daring band of warriors, Perseus sets off on a perilous journey deep into forbidden worlds. Battling unholy demons and fearsome beasts, he will triumph only if he can accept his power as a god, defy his fate and create his own destiny.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 12
programme.desc: Buyers battle to prove who's king of the playground and a can full of bicycle gear gets everyone's wheels turning. Plus, a mystery container includes one item that requires a special operating license. Who'll be able to haul it off the lot?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 16
programme.desc: While the guys try to give their significant others the perfect Valentine’s Day, Raj and Stuart throw a lonely people party at the comic book store.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 17
programme.desc: After a terrible date, Raj vows to never leave his apartment again. Meanwhile, Penny actually impresses Sheldon with her acting skills.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 18
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard try to advance the cause of women in science by speaking with junior high girls about their future careers, while Raj plans his date with Lucy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 19
programme.desc: When Howard finds a letter from his father, he's forced to confront his past, struggling with whether or not he should open it. And Leonard and Penny throw a grown-up cocktail party at the apartment.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 20
programme.desc: Let the battle begin! Leonard, Sheldon and Raj fight for tenure at the University – and the competition heats up when the girls get involved!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4 9
programme.desc: Murr, Joe, Sal and Q get creative with their French fries at the mall food court, and compete to see whose ridiculous invention will win over a focus group. Then, the guys head to the Jersey Shore to serve up some embarrassment at a beachside burgerjoint.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 1
programme.desc: Clark and Lois are enjoying small town life. However, Lois’ undercover assignment reveals a deadly foe that promises to change the Kent family forever.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 2
programme.desc: Clark and Chrissy both notice a small crack in Lois’ game face. Meanwhile, Sarah and Jordan have an awkward encounter. Lastly, Lana receives a panicked phone call.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 3
programme.desc: Lois and Chrissy pursue a new lead in the investigation against Clark's wishes. Lana, Sarah, and Kyle adjust to their own new normal.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 4
programme.desc: Lois interrupts an intense conversation between Clark and John Henry. Kyle tries to run interference between Sarah and Lana. Jonathan has a heated discussion with Candice’s dad.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 5
programme.desc: Clark and General Lane are both having a hard time giving Lois room to make her own decisions.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 2
programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 3
programme.desc: Our buyers go to war to win a locker packed with valuable vintage surf gear. Then, Brandon and Lori get stuck with a busted bin, but when they find a glass case filled with an unidentifiable goo, they're left wondering if this unit smells like moneyor just plain stinks. And later, the day's final auction unleashes a bidding war so medieval, someone will have to be carted away.

programme.title: East New York S1 8
programme.desc: When four party-goers fatally overdose, the 7-4’s investigation is impeded by an ongoing DEA operation, and Haywood asks Suarez for help. Also, Yenko deals with tension at home.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 6
programme.desc: Clark finds himself in uncharted territory, and Lois bonds with a new friend. Meanwhile, Superman pays Bruno Mannheim a surprise visit.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 13
programme.desc: A container riddled with bullets, a burned-out box, and a freak accident on the lot put everyone on edge, until an out-of-this-world discovery leads to the biggest win yet.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 1
programme.desc: The Jokers lack hospitality as bumbling bellhops, pitch bizarre inventions to a confused focus group, and serve lunch with a side of awkward when they man hot dog stands. Then, the guys reach for the sky to surprise tonight's big loser

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 2
programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Watch a guy pass out on an amusement park ride, a wild spring break fight, and the weirdest use of a Roman candle in the history of fireworks. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 13
programme.desc: A container riddled with bullets, a burned-out box, and a freak accident on the lot put everyone on edge, until an out-of-this-world discovery leads to the biggest win yet.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 1
programme.desc: The Jokers lack hospitality as bumbling bellhops, pitch bizarre inventions to a confused focus group, and serve lunch with a side of awkward when they man hot dog stands. Then, the guys reach for the sky to surprise tonight's big loser

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 6
programme.desc: Clark finds himself in uncharted territory, and Lois bonds with a new friend. Meanwhile, Superman pays Bruno Mannheim a surprise visit.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 2
programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 3
programme.desc: Our buyers go to war to win a locker packed with valuable vintage surf gear. Then, Brandon and Lori get stuck with a busted bin, but when they find a glass case filled with an unidentifiable goo, they're left wondering if this unit smells like moneyor just plain stinks. And later, the day's final auction unleashes a bidding war so medieval, someone will have to be carted away.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 21
programme.desc: After one of his favorite TV shows gets canceled too soon, Sheldon feels lost, so Amy tries to help him get over his compulsive need for closure.

programme.title: Friends S5 18
programme.desc: Rachel starts smoking when she realizes that her boss and co-workers at her new job are smokers. Monica and Phoebe plan a surprise birthday party for Rachel. Joey and Ben audition for a commercial.

programme.title: East New York S1 8
programme.desc: When four party-goers fatally overdose, the 7-4’s investigation is impeded by an ongoing DEA operation, and Haywood asks Suarez for help. Also, Yenko deals with tension at home.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Watch a guy pass out on an amusement park ride, a wild spring break fight, and the weirdest use of a Roman candle in the history of fireworks. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: AXN
programme.desc: AXN offers viewers a thrilling ride with an exciting slate of programs designed to exhilarate and help them escape the humdrum of daily routine. The leading English general entertainment destination among upscale, affluent adults aged 18-39, the channel delivers first run, exclusive top-rated drama series, blockbuster features, adventure and competitive reality programs from around the world, as well as made-in-Asia original productions. Launched first in Asia in 1997, AXN has become an international channel brand that is now seen across 60 countries globally including Latin America and Europe. In Asia, the channel is now watched by 154 million viewers in more than 104 million homes across 21 countries, including close to 50 million households on a time-block basis in China. AXN ASIA is wholly owned by Sony Pictures Entertainment and managed by Sony Pictures Television’s networks, Asia, which also operates pay-TV channels beTV, ANIMAX, SONY ENTERTAINMENT TELEVISION and ONE.

In Asia, the channel is now watched by 154 million viewers in more than 104 million homes across 21 countries, including close to 50 million households on a time-block basis in China. AXN ASIA is wholly owned by Sony Pictures Entertainment and managed by Sony Pictures Television’s networks, Asia, which also operates pay-TV channels beTV, ANIMAX, SONY ENTERTAINMENT TELEVISION and ONE.

programme.desc: Suren and Matt try Sri Lankan Cuisine in the cricket-themed restaurant, Upali's.

programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Bridget Brennan present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne on weather.

programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 109
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Spaghetti
programme.desc: Ready for spaghetti? Chef and photographer Joel Bennetts and Hope St Radio head chef Ellie Bouhadana join Adam to make fast pasta.

programme.title: This Place - Bobbinawarra
programme.desc: Bobbinawarra is Bangerang for pelican, and you are almost guaranteed to see one in the lakes, ponds and rivers that surround this tiny locale. Bangerang elder uncle Freddie Dowling tells how inland pelicans came to be.

programme.title: ABC News Regional - Episode 18
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - St Martins
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a family aiming to turn a tiny war memorial church into a holiday home in the face of local hopes it would be kept as a venerated public landmark. (Final)

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations - Henley Beach and Gold Coast
programme.desc: In Adelaide's Henley Beach, Paul and Marie transform an electricity converter station into a high-end entertainer's home, while on the Gold Coast, Chris and Antoinette reimagine a run-down house into a coastal retreat.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 91
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death, who takes the form of a young man killed in an accident, asks a media mogul to act as his guide to teach him about life on Earth and, in the process, he falls in love with the mogul's daughter.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Charlize Theron stars as Aeon Flux, the underground operative fighting totalitarian rule in 25th-century Earth’s last living city.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: Millionaire Thornton Melon’s (Rodney Dangerfield) son is a college misfit, so Thornton lends some fatherly support...by enrolling as a fellow freshman! Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton’s pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor’s girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he’ll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account – or go back to being the world’s wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin Button, born in 1918 with the physical state of an elderly man, ages in reverse. He experiences love and break-ups, ecstasy and sorrow, and timelessness by the time he dies in 2003 as a baby.

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Ruin Me
programme.desc: Six strangers sign up for “Slasher Sleepout”, a horror movie experience in which participants are dropped into a forest and pursued by knife-wielding assassins. When the participants begin to die one after the other, Alexandra, who has never seen a horror film before, must unravel the mysteries in order to survive the ordeal.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: The Revenge
programme.desc: Ruo Wei returns to her childhood home with two best friends, and reunites with her cousin who has always lived there. While they plan to enjoy their trip, they are constantly haunted by paranormal events, ending up in a terrifying experience with unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Beast Mode
programme.desc: A Hollywood director accidentally kills his leading actor and has to find an exact duplicate to proceed with the filming. To do that, he must agree to an evil pact which unleashes a band of bloodthirsty, shape-shifting, ferocious beasts onto L.A…

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Residents of Robeson, Pennsylvania were stunned when Ashley Kline went missing on New Year's Eve. The 12-day search turned up several suspects until investigators uncovered suspicious text messages.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Nia Wilson and her two sisters decided to take public transportation back home. But just minutes after texting their father, the sisters were brutally targeted at a train station.
